title: Uncle Tom's Cabin - "stars to hold their candles"

content.prompt: The phrase “with the stars to hold their candles” (second sentence) is used to suggest that the “men” (earlier in the same sentence)

choices.label: were too proud to acknowledge a higher power
lived without the benefit of artificial illumination
cursed those who suffered under the shackles of civilization
exploited nature without worrying about the consequences

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
